      • getFile

        private void getFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                     long fileLength)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a file by name and length.
        参数:
        fileName - the name of the file that wants getting.
        fileLength - the length of the file that wants getting.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IOException.
